name: Oberty
description:
Oberty is a minimalist shape-blending puzzle.

Black + Black = White


Rotate and blend cards with XOR rule: "Black + Black = White".
Oberty gives you a few tiles with simple geometric shapes, choose some, rotate and combine tiles to reach target shape.

• 200+ puzzles to complete
• Relaxing
• Minimal
• Monochromatic
• Atmospheric original soundtrack
• Inclusive color schemes for people with visual impairment
• Level editor, create and share you cards with friends

LEVEL EDITOR

Create your own unique level-cards, share it to your friends by sending picture.



To play level simply load it from picture of level-card.
